website_summaries.verdict: This tie is available in many patterns, is 3.4 inches in width, is accompanied by a pocket square, and comes at a low price point.
pros: Material of this tie makes it easier to tie around neck into a knot
Available in wide range of colors and patterns to suit any style
Tie has a lovely sheen to it
cons: Made of polyester rather than silk

customer_reviews.title: NOT silk, Burn test conducted
customer_reviews.text: Like many, I was curious whether or not this "100% silk" tie was actually silk. The best and easiest way to determine this is the burn test, and I conducted it on the pocket square. The result is in the attached photo. As you can see, it is NOT silk. Rather than burn and turn into ash, the material melted into black beads. The smell was distinctly plastic. The material is not silk, and the description is false.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Distinguished, Not Gaudy (black with cross-hatched lines pattern)
customer_reviews.text: This tie looks great with my black suit! The tie is really only dark gray and not black as advertised, but I love it. The design is for someone who wants to look distinguished and professional but not flashy or gaudy. Highly recommend this color. Also having the handkerchief was very nice as I did not notice from the pictures that it was coming with it. If this review was helpful, please click the appropriate button below. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: SCHROCK||919

customer_reviews.title: Well-Constructed, Conservative Look
customer_reviews.text: Nice accessory for a black, gray or navy blue suit. The seams are tight and there's not much puckering of the material after several wearings.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this set for my dad as a gift and my dad (he is 73 and rather dapper) loved this set, he even wore the handkerchief that came with it, which was surprising to me; he received many compliments on the royal color so I know he will wear this often now :) It came in a nice packaging also. My dad is a little over 6ft so it's a perfect length also for how ties should hang on a man in a suit. Keeping this as spare 'go to gift' for any other male friends/family members, very beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: K G

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It looked great on my husband! Both the tie and the handkerchief were as described. The material was durable, somewhat thick (not cheap) with a high tread count. The seams of the tie were well stitched. It was easy to tie (not to stiff or too flimsy).The dark blue color was a true navy blue. It did not leave marks or bleed color on my hands or my husband's white shirt. I was pleased with the quality and will definitely order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Always an adventure

customer_reviews.title: Good given the price
customer_reviews.text: Let's make no mistake, this is an inexpensive tie. The silk and lining are thin. It doesn't look substantial. It also comes in a plastic bag rather than a box. I don't use pocket squares but this one seems very stiff. That said, it is a good inexpensive tie. It is well made and it hangs well. If you need a tie for a specific occasion (I needed a black tie for a funeral) or if you just want a broad assortment of ties, I would recommend this. I would also have been happy with this as a father's day gift when my kids were younger (although the lack of a box might be a problem).
customer_reviews.author: Dave P

customer_reviews.title: Has a nice design and subtle texture but the stitching came undone ...
customer_reviews.text: Has a nice design and subtle texture but the stitching came undone within a few weeks. Wore it maybe 3 or 4 times, never washed it or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tie in several variations, and I am completely satisfied with my purchase. They look as expected and are good quality for the price. They are not super expensive, but do feel nice as well as have a quality appearance. I would consider these to be a good bye...I bought this tie in several variations, and I am completely satisfied with my purchase. They look as expected and are good quality for the price. They are not super expensive, but do feel nice as well as have a quality appearance. I would consider these to be a good BUY...
customer_reviews.author: Matthew O. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Tie's Tie's Tie's
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the cost - looks nice but the feel is alright at best. Not bad for a work gift - my coworker loves ties. And it was nice that it came with a pocket square to match . You've got a good deal if you're looking for something that looks nice without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the pictures!
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged and looks just as nice as the pictures! Color is rich and beautiful. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect too much from this tie because of the price and also because it's hard to buy clothes and accessories without seeing them in front of you. It turned out that this tie is great. It doesn't have the "cheap quality look" and for a high price. You won't regret buying this tie. I wear ties every day to go to work, and now I found a high-quality product for an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Black but not boring.
customer_reviews.text: My son needed a black tie for a concert. As we live 6 hours apart, I went on Amazon to see what was available. A few clicks and I let him know one was on the way. He likes it. It will work for the concert and I saw him wear it and it looked great. Great price for a tie with square in my opinion, and with Prime - he had it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: It looked wonderful on him and my brother would have been pleased
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tie for my husband to wear to honor my brother who passed away 3/7/18 and was a true Dallas Cowboy fan. It looked wonderful on him and my brother would have been pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional value
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these ties! They are very well made and the material is as nice as many that I have purchased for 6 times more. I am a relatively tall person, 6'3" and the length is great! The workmanship is really good, handmade!
customer_reviews.author: M. Speer

customer_reviews.title: Husband approved
customer_reviews.text: Got my husband a new suit and he wanted a nice tie to go with it. He's a extremely picky, with feel and look. This looks exactly as pictured. Length is as described. Didn't use the handkerchief, but this is his new favorite tie.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: The tie seemed a little short in length, and it is definitely not silk as described but polyester, or it is the roughest silk ever. For the price I was not really expecting it to be silk, though. However, for the price the set looked nice with my husband's tuxedo and was a nice alternative to a bowtie. The plaid pattern was subtle (I bought the black set) but added a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Colors are brilliant and sharp in appearance. Fits well. Nice blend of colors to give the individual options when suiting up for work or a night out.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: beautiful tie
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend for a dance, it perfectly matched my dress and the color on the screen. beautiful set, love that it came with the pocket square as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Longer than regular ties which is a plus for bigger guys.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 6th Hisdern tie and it has yet to disappoint. For the money it’s a pretty good tie. The best thing about it is that I’m 6’ 2” and it’s hard to find a tie that the tag end is long enough to go in the back of tie, I usually tuck it in my shirt but these seem longer and I never have a problem with them. This is my number one selling point. I will continue to buy many more ties
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tie with matching handkerchief
customer_reviews.text: Great tie with matching handkerchief, looks very elegant, the photos don't clearly reflect how well made this tie is and label reflects its 100% silk. The first time I wore it I received several comments as to how good it looked. Plan to buy more ties from this company.
customer_reviews.author: RD of NC

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this tie. He wears is often. Gave it as a Christmas stocking stuffer. I would honestly say that out of he fifty ties he has, this is one of the nicer ones!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Great tie
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tie but it's a little more purple than pink. The picture looks a little more pink than it really is. It's still a great, high quality tie.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: SHARP TIE
customer_reviews.text: This tie is rich in color and my husband really liked it. He wore it to our daughter's wedding. He looked so sharp and handsome!
customer_reviews.author: Neso'

customer_reviews.title: Nicely packaged. Beautiful color in person (blue)
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Nicely packaged. Beautiful color in person (blue). Sturdy fabric and smooth to the touch. The tie bunches weird sometimes but a sturdy tug and it flattens out to its proper shape. For the price was a lot nicer quality than expected. I thought it was going to be thin and flimsy but not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Beth R.

customer_reviews.title: Fabric and length is underwhelming
customer_reviews.text: Pros -Pretty Thick and Wide Tie -Fast Shipping(coming from someone who lives in Hawaii) -Great Price for Tie AND pocket square Cons -Length is not as long as I'd like it to be, for someone with a long neck and tall upper body -The material is not as great as you would see in other ties but what do you expect for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jimwell B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tie
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sharp looking tie. I am most definitely purchasing more ties from this seller. I highly recommend this tie. I use the Windsor tie knot and this tie looks awesome that way. Try it and you will agree.
customer_reviews.author: FREESTYLE

customer_reviews.title: Not silk, but nice for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: The product is clearly not silk. You can tell it's not silk as soon as you touch it; it feels gritty, not smooth. Plus the tags do not say "silk" at all, as you would expect if it was in fact silk. At the time I purchased, the product description promised that the tie was 100% silk. The misleading product description merits a one-star review. However, the tie I received is nice quality for what it is, and I'm going to keep it. So I added two stars back. But be aware that you can find better values for real silk ties elsewhere on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: WF

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and length. My husband is a big guy and it fit him perfectly with baby blue shirt and navy suit. I will purchase other colors. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Moke

customer_reviews.title: Stunning quality
customer_reviews.text: Stunning quilty and very pleased with the item. Really glad to purchase this. Well packaged and arrived very quickly. I highly recommend the product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: monkey

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: if you know how to wear and pair with, you will feel as a superstar when its around your neck
customer_reviews.author: luigithehun

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by Quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the price. I bought for a wedding and surprised by the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, highly recommend!! ☺👍
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tie set. One of the ties has a thread showing on it, but other than that it's nice!!! ☺☺👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Mwink

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tie
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tie for my nephew to wear to a high school dance. When looking at the picture, I had assumed the tie was beige and white. However, when it arrived, it was all beige. It still looked great, though, and it matched his date's dress perfectly. It did come with a matching handkerchief, but he never used it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Clark

customer_reviews.title: Not a cheap alternative for the professional
customer_reviews.text: This is not a cheap alternative for the professional. It is great if you work an entry level position but not for the serious professional. Not a total loss; will gift it to my 15 year old to wear for events.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan M. Grier

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality at a fantastic price.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about the tie and the experience. The tie is beautiful and exactly as described. The material is heavy and well made. First class. I am definitely buying more. Gorgeous color.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Bought as gift
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Loved the color. Looks great when tied. Quality material. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda D.

customer_reviews.title: Quality material
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value, bought to match the color of my wife's dress for a formal wedding and it did. Will buy this brand again. Good thickness for a proper knot, and length was good for my 6 foot height. Pocket cloth was a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Geezer Mike

customer_reviews.title: Late delivery
customer_reviews.text: The tie is great. I bought 13 of them for my daughters weddings by on September 12. One of our guys had to do withbout. Thanks for the late delivery. Love the tie but not the service from this shop. Patricia Hall
customer_reviews.author: Kaylah

customer_reviews.title: Not Red
customer_reviews.text: I bought the "red" and if is not red, it is a dark burgundy color.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Fast Shipping Nice looking tie Doesn’t look cheap Son liked it for his HOCO

customer_reviews.title: Black in black
customer_reviews.text: Great look with alot of outfits, classy Easy to match pattern

customer_reviews.title: Great tie for a great price! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Really nice tie! Highly recommend! Price is great especially for the look and quality of the tie! Will be ordering a few in the other color options

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and attractive
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed a new tie quickly for an event. I didn’t have time to run to the mall so I took a chance on this based on reviews. It looked classy, the fabric was very nice, and it did the job perfectly, Would definitely order again.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wedding tie!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and son. I LOVE THESE TIES!!! Arrived exactly on time!!! Perfect for the wedding that we are going to! Thank you...

customer_reviews.title: this is the best quality tie that I recall buying in a very ...
customer_reviews.text: Next to the hand-made tie that I purchased from France, this is the best quality tie that I recall buying in a very long time! The construction is perfect as is the width and knot formed after tying.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tie and hanky set
customer_reviews.text: Purchased at the last minute for a wedding. Very nice tie and hanky set, it was even long enough for my dad to wear (he's super tall and usually has to buy extra long ties). It had minimal wrinkles and was wearable straight out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: raygracy

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by quality.
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe the quality of this product. It is more beautiful in present and high end looking. The silk scarf is just as nice! I am amazed and pleased. I love buying nice ties and this one wowed me. Will look handsome on any man.

customer_reviews.title: Thick fabric, high quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Thick tie. If you don’t like thick fabric this isn’t for you

customer_reviews.title: Five star tie
customer_reviews.text: The tie looks and feels great. Overall sturdy build quality and has many good colors. Glad it came with a matching pocket square. Great price as well.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice tie
customer_reviews.text: Really nice tie, good size too I’m 6’ 3” and it fit perfectly. Amazing color.

customer_reviews.title: Quality!

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing but is a little frayed
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing with my suite and the hankercheif is a nice touch. Only problem is it was slightly frayed upon arrival. After a couple seconds with my lighter it was fine though

customer_reviews.title: This is an insanely nice tie. I don't spend a whole lot on ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an insanely nice tie. I don't spend a whole lot on ties but this is probably the nicest one I own now. It came in very nice packaging and was 100% free of wrinkles. Highly reccommend this tie, especially for the price!

customer_reviews.title: Impressed

customer_reviews.title: This tie is exactly like my blue work tie but it's black
customer_reviews.text: This tie is exactly like my blue work tie but it's black. It's very sleek and I love it. I've also received a few compliments on the tie. Folks really like the pattern.

customer_reviews.title: very nice gift

customer_reviews.title: This was a surprisingly high quality tie and handkerchief set ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a surprisingly high quality tie and handkerchief set. It's silky and reflects light well, and has a solid and high quality feel to it. It doesn't feel thin or cheap, it's beyond what I expected!

customer_reviews.title: Burgundy and Blue darker than expected
customer_reviews.text: Feels great as far as quality goes and the length is perfect. Buyer beware, the burgundy and blue is a lot darker than it looks like in the picture, looks more like a dark purple so in the future an accurate pic would be nice but aside from that, great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cisco

customer_reviews.title: He loved it! It's a lovely gift at a great ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter saw The Bachelor wearing a suit and tie with a pocket square and had to get a set for her dad for Christmas. He loved it! It's a lovely gift at a great price.

product_meta.title: HISDERN Plaid Polka Dots Stripe Tie Handkerchief Woven Classic Men's Necktie & Pocket Square Set
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :9.9 x 3.75 x 0.85 inches; 3.52 Ounces
 * Item model number :TC442B8S
 * Department :Mens
 * Date First Available :June 26, 2015
 * ASIN :B010FMOO8Q

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #15,889 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #6 inMen's Tie Sets 
    *  #4083 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars1,942 ratings
feature_bullets: 【Design】 This navy blue tie uses a subtle and simple criss-cross pattern which is sophisticated enough to be worn out for a nice dinner, but casual enough to wear to work. It's the best of both worlds!

【Material】 Made from woven microfibre that is soft, rich in colour and beautiful to feel. The stitching and thread are gorgeous. Good quality interlining make it easy to tie a perfect knot. High quality control make our tie can be used for long time.
